title: Mathematics of Data Sci
description: Data science methods and their mathematical foundations: linear regression, classification, and clustering, kernel methods, regression trees and ensemble methods, dimension reduction.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3235 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
